title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E. D.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and brush and black ink, pen and blue ink, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: E.D.; at upper corner: 952.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Square monogram comprised of an "E" in the form of a black square upon which is superimposed an arc decorated with a thick blue line flanked by two thinner lines which form the curved element of the "D". 
On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
Puiforcat fabrication #:

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E. D.", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and brush and black ink, pen and blue ink, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-85.
